summary.name: Casa Colonial La Terraza
summary.tagline: 3-star B&B with restaurant, near Hotel Nacional de Cuba

overview.accessibilityLabel: Overview of Casa Colonial La Terraza

items.text: Full breakfast (surcharge) each morning 8:00 AMâ€“11:00 AM

address.addressLine: Padre Varela 207, entre Neptuno y Concordia, Havana, La Habana, 10200

editorial.title: Havana
content: Casa Colonial La Terraza is located in Centro Havana, a neighborhood in Havana, and is near the airport and near the boardwalk. Havana Cruise Terminal and Ferry Terminal are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those in the mood for shopping can visit San Rafael Boulevard and Plaza Carlos III. Looking to enjoy an event or a game while in town? See what's going on at Estadio Latinoamericano, or consider a night out at Casa de la Musica de Centro.

primary.value: Disinfectant is used to clean the property
High-touch surfaces are cleaned and disinfected
Property is disinfected using an electrostatic sprayer
Sheets and towels are washed at 60Â°C/140Â°F or hotter
Guest accommodations are sealed after cleaning
Follows industry cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global) and Intertek Cristal (3rd party expert - Global)
Guest rooms kept vacant for 24 hours between stays
Personal protective equipment worn by staff
Masks are required at the property
Enhanced food service safety measures are in place
Individually-wrapped food options available for breakfast, dinner, and through room service
At check-in, guests must provide either a negative COVID-19 test result or a record of full COVID-19 vaccination
This information is provided by our partners.
